description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Werribee, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Lancemore Werribee Mansion Romance near Shadowfax Winery
hotels.description: The crowning jewel of Werribee Park's magnificent grounds, the award-winning Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park is a haven of tranquility less than an hour's drive from Melbourne's CBD. This regal retreat boasts impressive facilities, including fine food at Joseph's Dining, picturesque ornamental English gardens, and easy access to the boutique Shadowfax Winery and Werribee Open Range Zoo. When you seek privacy, retire to your boutique room, complete with modern amenities and rich period features. There's so much to do in Werribee and the surrounding areas - enjoy a stroll through the nearby Victoria State Rose Garden, tackle the stunning Werribee Gorge Circuit Walk, experience ultimate bliss with a treatment at the onsite luxury spa, sample a local tipple at Shadowfax Winery's cellar door or go on safari to see the giraffe, zebra, gorillas, koalas and more at Werribee Open Range Zoo.

hotels.title: Werribee Modern Escape with Upscale Bistro & Bar
hotels.description: Uncover Victoria's western suburbs' hub when you stay at the Holiday Inn Werribee, an IHG Hotel. The hotel's stellar location places you within easy access to many local attractions, including Werribee Open Range Zoo, Victorian State Rose Garden and Werribee Park Mansion. Enjoy dinners at Rosana Bistro and Bar for upscale pub gastronomy (beer-battered fish and chips and sourdough burgers are just the start), and take advantage of the light-filled fitness centre with all modern equipment.

seo.title: Hôtels à Werribee - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Werribee, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
